long8.name: Tabiat
long8.text1: Oqsaroy — Shahrisabzdagi meʼmoriy yodgorlik (1380—1404). Amir Temur qurdirgan. Shaharning shim.sharqidagi bosh maydonda joylashgan.

long8.name: Nature
long8.text1: Aksaroy is an architectural monument in Shahrisabz (1380-1404). Built by Amir Temur. It is located in the main square in the northeast of the city. Only the huge gable, the minarets at both ends,

long8.name: Природа
long8.text1: Аксарай – памятник архитектуры в Шахрисабзе (1380-1404 гг.). Построен Амиром Темуром. Он расположен на главной площади на северо-востоке города.
